sql_context: CREATE TABLE employees(id INT, name VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(50));
sql_explanation: Простейший запрос на выборку всех столбцов и строк из таблицы.

sql_context: CREATE TABLE employees(id INT, name VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(50));
sql_explanation: Запрос с условием WHERE для фильтрации по отделу.
sql_variation_1: SELECT name FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';

sql_context: CREATE TABLE employees(id INT, name VARCHAR(50), dept_id INT); CREATE TABLE departments(id INT, name VARCHAR(50));
sql_explanation: d.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.id;
prompt_variation_1: Соединение таблиц employees и departments по внешнему ключу.
sql_variation_2: d.name as department FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.id;
column18: d.name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.id;
